tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) due to improper handling of dynamic params in the example code snippets, where values obtained from HTTP headers and request metadata are embedded into application-generated URLs and markup without sufficient context-aware encoding. Because these values can influence attributes, anchors, or other HTML and JavaScript contexts, an attacker may craft a malicious request that injects an executable script into the rendered page, leading to arbitrary script execution in the victimâ€™s browser, session compromise, data exfiltration, or unauthorized actions within the application context.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version within the vulnerable range and have used the maintainer's example code templates.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `globalpayments/php-sdk` library to the patch version or patch your code that was built using the example code snippets.
